## Overview

canHealthWaitR is an R package that provides tools for exploring Canadian
health care wait time data from Statistics Canada's Web Data Service (WDS).

The package focuses on curated tables related to specialist wait times and
health care access indicators.

## Example workflow

```{r example_data}
example_data <- tibble::tibble(
  specialty = c("Cardiology", "Orthopedics", "Dermatology"),
  wait_days = c(30, 75, 45)
)

example_data
```

```{r summary}
summary_tbl <- dplyr::summarise(example_data, mean_wait = mean(wait_days))
summary_tbl
```

```{r plot}
ggplot2::ggplot(example_data, ggplot2::aes(x = specialty, y = wait_days)) +
  ggplot2::geom_col()
```
